SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.view

Class ViewWrapper

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.view.ViewWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
VirtualView, Serializable, Remote
public class ViewWrapper extends UnicastRemoteObject implements VirtualView
Client-side remote object that receive Remote Method Invocations from the Server and "transform" them into messages that will be processed by the actual View (View) asynchronously.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form

  • Constructor Details

    • ViewWrapper

      public ViewWrapper(View view) throws RemoteException
      Builds a new ViewWrapper remote object that wraps the provided view.
      Parameters:
      view - the View that needs to be wrapped. Usually the local View is unique.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

  • Method Details

    • setController

      public void setController(VirtualController controller) throws RemoteException
      Provides (synchronously) a reference to the remote VirtualController Object that allows the user to play the game. The provided VirtualController will be handled by the ServerHandler (RMIServerHandler) and used to send messages.
      Specified by:
      setController in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      controller - a remove object that the player can use to play the game
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

    • setPlayerIdentifier

      public void setPlayerIdentifier(String playerIdentifier) throws RemoteException
      Asynchronously sets the identifier of the local player. The player identifier encapsulated into each outbound message in order for the server to recognize the sender. The identifier is mandatory for most messages.
      Specified by:
      setPlayerIdentifier in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      playerIdentifier - the playerIdentifier generated by the server for this client
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

    • updateGameStatus

      public void updateGameStatus(GameStatus gameStatus, TurnStatus turnStatus, String playersTurn) throws RemoteException

      Specified by:
      updateGameStatus in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      gameStatus - the current game phase
      turnStatus - the current turn status (either DRAW or PLACE)
      playersTurn - the nickname of the player that needs to play.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

    • ping

      public void ping(boolean isAnswer) throws RemoteException
      Allows to perform an asynchronous ping request/answer to the Client's View.
      Specified by:
      ping in interface VirtualView
      Parameters:
      isAnswer - true if the server is answering to a previous ping message, false if the server is checking on the client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if an error occurs during remote communication

      Parameters:
